basic.description: Concept and meaning of race, racism, and racialization; ethnicity; processes, policies, and practices of differentiation; the impact of racism and discrimination on various populations; intersections of race, ethnicity, class and gender.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Race and Racialization

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of C- in SOCY122.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from SOCY233; SOCY235.
